channel.title: [PI] Barrows Help

item.title: [PI] Barrows Help
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

public void handleHitMask(int damage, int mask, int icon, int soak, boolean maxHit) { if (!hitUpdateRequired) { hitDiff = damage; hitMask = maxHit ? 1 : mask; hitIcon = icon; soakDamage = soak; hitUpdateRequired = true; } else if (!hitUpdateRequired2) { hitDiff2 = damage; hitMask2 = maxHit ? 1 : mask; hitIcon2 = icon; soakDamage2 = soak; hitUpdateRequired2 = true; } updateRequired = true; }

^ That was my handleHitMask method. How do I convert “c.handleHitMask(5);” so that it does 5 damage?

Read full topic
